Anyone else having Chrome Dev Tools randomly open when working in the new design manager? Not sure if this has something to do with me having the React dev tools add-on or anything

haven’t noticed that happening but the latest version of chrome(might still be in the beta build) has a new feature that would explain what you’re seeing to a degree. They have a thing where if you change html or css and refresh the page, it can store your changes and show them again and that would explain the inspector re-opening.

Can’t garuntee that’s what you’re seeing though, just thought it was a possibility

I have mine auto opening with a new window. There is a seetings in dev tool settings
Anyone else having issues with the "add" modules sidebar? I picked Custom Modules as the filter and it returns there are no Modules even though I know there are custom modules in the portal.
